name: Halloween Rider - Escape out the Darkness to the Gates of Hell
name_original: Halloween Rider - Escape out the Darkness to the Gates of Hell
description:
” Highly addictive fast paced Gameplay.”
” Adorable graphic style.”
” Exciting Levels.”
___________________________________

Looking for some real fun on the Halloween night? Halloween Rider is an exclusive Halloween game made especially for you. Use the arrow keys to steer the Halloween rider and help him in his journey on the cemetery.

Each level is different than the previous level and as you progress in the game, the terrain will get more difficult to overcome. Make sure to help the Halloween rider maneuver the tricky turns and dangerous obstacles on the way. Have fun and happy Halloween!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Adorable graphic style
Individual graphics and sound settings
Highly addictive fast paced Gameplay
Exciting levels
